articles.author: Sammy Westfall
articles.title: Denmark Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen attacked in Copenhagen - The Washington Post
articles.description: The attack on Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen in Copenhagen is the latest attack against politicians ahead of the European Parliament elections.
articles.content: A man attacked Denmarks Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen in the capital on Friday, two days before Danes vote in the European Parliament elections, the prime ministers office said. The man was arrest… [+2204 chars]
